summary: the music in le premier ? i f u c k i n l o v e. seriously i think it was a little funny the way the music stopped when they...
body: the music in le premier ? i f u c k i n l o v e. seriously i think it was a little funny the way the music stopped when they were in the tunnel every time eliott turned the flashlight off like i know it was most likely for a different effect but it made me smile sldfjkldsfj and oh man at the kiss scene ? music can sometimes make or break scenes like those and skamfr n a i l e d i t. the soft strains of the song started right as lucas lifted up his hands to hold eliott’s and it slowly got louder until they kissed, which was when the lyrics started and the music was at full volume. just,, gorgeous.

blog.name: hamkyo77
blog.title: My Messy Gay World !!
blog.description:
Name's Hamza 29 French Gay.
Phone user.
Fanboy of many (gay)things.

tags: I have so much emotion and love in me it's scary and great at the same time lol
body:
TedxTalks

I honestly can’t deal with my feelings anymore, I’m French (gay) and it’s rare to see a gay storyline on tv, in France who’s rarely deal or talk about lgbtq+ and Skam did this and I’m not ok because it’s SO damn great/beautiful/perfect. Both Maxence and Axel (the actors) did an amazing job and I love them for it.

All this to say I’m not usually into a tv show that much, like I’m not going full fanboy or something. But Skam did this, they get into my heart and I’m not ready to deal with it lol

*Sorry I’m emotional, I hope that I’m understandable enough, needed to let it out. lol*

It was my TedxTalks

I still have a lot to talk about it but it’s better for me to stop here.

*going back sobbing a little*

reblog.comment:

DISNEY SERIES | Early-July

tags: none of these gifs are mine
will add when i find them
title: VENDREDI, 15 FÉVRIER
body:
The way Eliott said ‘’like we planned’’ as if they had already made plans and the girls were intruders and ruined their night. Lucas being on board with that and agreeing, admitting that he wanted to be alone with Eliott.

Lucas’s little smirk when Eliott said they should go

Eliott repeating himself and making it clear that Lucas was the first person he brought to his shelter/safe place ‘’This place is a shelter. It’s where I go when I wanna be alone.’’

[NEED THAT GIF]

Eliott tugging Lucas toward the tunnel 

Eliott trying to scare Lucas, circling around him with the light

Lucas panicking when the light goes out and admitting he was a bit scared

[NEED THAT GIF]

Eliott vanishing just as they were about to kiss - look at his parted lips. Lucas was so ready but Eliott had other plans

The hand thing!! When he reached out to Eliott to let him know that he knows and has seen Polaris. And Eliott lacing their hands together, just like the picture on his Instagram.

Eliott squeezed Lucas’s hands as if to check if it was real. If Lucas was really there

They were both so happy and smiling and love-drunk

Was that a hand on the butt, Lucas!?

The hug at the end when Lucas buried is face in Eliott’s neck after the kiss ended

summary: And no one interrupted them. No screaming little girl calling out for mom, or no Renato. It was just them, only them. Living in...
body: And no one interrupted them. No screaming little girl calling out for mom, or no Renato. It was just them, only them. Living in the moment. The moment where they both finally felt free and at home. Just two boys in love and finally in each other’s arms. And it was absolutely beautiful.

reblog.comment: And no one interrupted them. No screaming little girl calling out for mom, or no Renato. It was just them, only them. Living in the moment. The moment where they both finally felt free and at home. Just two boys in love and finally in each other’s arms. And it was absolutely beautiful.

trail.content_raw: And no one interrupted them. No screaming little girl calling out for mom, or no Renato. It was just them, only them. Living in the moment. The moment where they both finally felt free and at home. Just two boys in love and finally in each other’s arms. And it was absolutely beautiful.
trail.content: And no one interrupted them. No screaming little girl calling out for mom, or no Renato. It was just them, only them. Living in the moment. The moment where they both finally felt free and at home. Just two boys in love and finally in each other’s arms. And it was absolutely beautiful.
